category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TWP.Tooltips
preference.preference_description: Defines the properties to be displayed as tooltips for the elements in the Time Way Planner view of the Manufacturing Process Planner application. Valid Values: object-name - Only the Operation object name is supported. property-name - The internal name of the operation. The property-name string is replaced by the property display name and its value, for example, the value Name: [bl_rev_object_name] is displayed as Name: Object Name. You can add multiple values using a separator, for example, TooltipProperties:[property1],[property2],[property3].
